name: POVERTY ERADICATION AND CHILDREN EDUCATION(PEACE)
briefDescription: PEACE is working for rural women ,children and unorganized sector.We have conducted Free Tuition centre and 360 dalit students were benefitted.We have conducted skill training to 590 rural women and 180 women were engaged in Income generation activiites. We have conducted vocational training to as 465 adolencese girls.3500 general public were got awarenes  on domestic violence act.960 SHG women were senstized on Right to Information Act.More than 5000 general public and 2400 students were senstized on environmental issues.210 women were attended the cervical screening Test camp and 35 were identified and referred to GH.1200 women were senstized on cervical and breast cancer.We have conducted one Residential school for Drop out children.
